description: Wall vertex object representing individual vertices of walls. Cannot be instantiated directly - obtain instances via itasca.wall.vertex.list() or itasca.wall.vertex.find(). Vertices control wall geometry by setting their positions.
instantiation: Cannot be instantiated. Obtained via itasca.wall.vertex.list() or itasca.wall.vertex.find()

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete this vertex. All facets sharing the vertex are deleted and the wall position is updated.

methods.name: facets
methods.description: Get the facets sharing this vertex.

returns.description: Tuple of facet objects sharing this vertex

methods.name: id
methods.description: Get the vertex id.

methods.name: pos
methods.description: Get the vertex location.

methods.name: pos_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the vertex location.

methods.name: pos_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the vertex location.

methods.name: pos_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the vertex location.

methods.name: set_pos
methods.description: Set the vertex location. This is the primary way to control wall geometry.

methods.name: set_pos_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the vertex location.

methods.name: set_pos_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the vertex location.

methods.name: set_pos_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the vertex location.

methods.name: set_vel
methods.description: Set the vertex velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_x
methods.description: Set the x-component of the vertex velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_y
methods.description: Set the y-component of the vertex velocity.

methods.name: set_vel_z
methods.description: Set the z-component of the vertex velocity.

methods.name: valid
methods.description: Get True if this object is a live vertex.

methods.name: vel
methods.description: Get the vertex velocity.

methods.name: vel_x
methods.description: Get the x-component of the vertex velocity.

methods.name: vel_y
methods.description: Get the y-component of the vertex velocity.

methods.name: vel_z
methods.description: Get the z-component of the vertex velocity.
